advancedcompass.config.gui.yoff.tt: Offset from top of the screen (from 0 to 50)
advancedcompass.config.gui.maxrad.tt: Maximum distance from entity to player to show entity icon (from 0 to 999)
advancedcompass.config.gui.grouprad.tt: Maximum distance between entities to merge them into group (from 5 to 15)
advancedcompass.config.gui.viewan.tt: Angle of view that fits into the compass (from 30 to 360)
advancedcompass.config.gui.angletr.tt: Maximum angle between entity and player to render icon (from 15 to 180)
advancedcompass.config.gui.moveboss.tt: Move vanilla bossbar below the compass
advancedcompass.config.gui.overlapthresh: Overlap in pixels to hide overlapped icon (from 0 to 10)
advancedcompass.waypoints.exists.1: Waypoint with this name already exists
advancedcompass.waypoints.exists.2: Press "Save" again to override it or change the name
advancedcompass.waypoints.empty: Can't create waypoint with empty name!
advancedcompass.waypoint.name: Name:
advancedcompass.waypoint.distance.tt: Minimum and maximum distance where waypoint will render (Max = 0 means there is no maximum and it will render in any distance above minimum)
